start.text: The wind howls through the ruins. The woman watches you, hand resting on her blade.
start.speaker: Narrator

approach.text: 'You carry a heavy burden, traveler,' she says, eyeing the child.
approach.speaker: Woman

ignore.text: You walk past. She chuckles darkly. 'Suit yourself.'
ignore.speaker: Woman

survive.text: 'Survival is not enough,' she whispers. 'But it is a start.'
survive.speaker: Woman

aggressive.text: Her grip tightens on the katana. 'Easy, fox. I am not your enemy... yet.'
aggressive.speaker: Woman
